channel.title: Hopefully only small bit of help...Please look at question at bottom
channel.description:
Hello everyone, im sure you have heard this a million times. I used the no-ip tut and i have made one. I have a source and edited, compiled etc... I have created a rule in my fire wall and all thats left to do is my router forwarding. I have tried EVERYTHING and I can't even get the log in page up. Can anyone help? Or what else can i do?. All help will be greatly appreciated. Thank you very much. Broony.
Oh, i was told that i dont need to forward, just run server and people can play, is this true?

item.title: Hopefully only small bit of help...Please look at question at bottom
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

Thats what Im for

Read full topic
item.source: Hopefully only small bit of help...Please look at question at bottom

item.title: Hopefully only small bit of help...Please look at question at bottom
item.dc:creator: @broony broony
item.description:
@broony wrote:

It’s ok people, got it working. Ill post details on my server in the near future. Zenzie I would rep you but I can’t. Thanks again.
Broony

Read full topic

item.title: Hopefully only small bit of help...Please look at question at bottom
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

Follow a good tut with pictures or go to

www.portforward.com and search your router [read it on your router]

Read full topic
